::KitKat::

In stasis lock.  She dreamed she was in a place far away from the 
war.  It was beautiful.  Lush,green hillsides, trees filled with 
flowers and fruits.  Waterfalls that fell into clear blue pools that 
teamed with fish and lily pads.  She could hear birds singing in the 
distance.  The sun was high and felt warm to her.  She smiled at the 
vision. 

Laying on the ground, her eyes closed.  Her body lay there, 
motionless.
